verses.verse: Also I in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4075>Mede<s%>, even I, <S%H5977>stood<s%> to <S%H2388>confirm<s%> and to <S%H4581>strengthen<s%> him.

And now will I <S%H5046>shew<s%> thee the <S%H571>truth<s%>. Behold, there shall stand <S%H5975>up<s%> yet <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> in <S%H6539>Persia<s%>; and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> shall be <S%H6239>far<s%> <S%H6238>richer<s%> than they <S%H1419>all<s%>: and by his <S%H2393>strength<s%> through his <S%H6239>riches<s%> he shall stir <S%H5782>up<s%> all against the <S%H4438>realm<s%> of <S%H3120>Grecia<s%>.

And a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> shall stand <S%H5975>up<s%>, that shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> with <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4474>dominion<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to his <S%H7522>will<s%>.

And when he shall stand <S%H5975>up<s%>, his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%>, and shall be <S%H2673>divided<s%> toward the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and not to his <S%H319>posterity<s%>, nor according to his <S%H4915>dominion<s%> which he <S%H4910>ruled<s%>: for his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> shall be plucked <S%H5428>up<s%>, even for <S%H312>others<s%> beside those.

Â¶ And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, and one of his <S%H8269>princes<s%>; and he shall be <S%H2388>strong<s%> above him, and have <S%H4910>dominion<s%>; his <S%H4475>dominion<s%> shall be a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4474>dominion<s%>.

And in the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> they shall join themselves <S%H2266>together<s%>; for the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4339>agreement<s%>: but she shall not <S%H6113>retain<s%> the <S%H3581>power<s%> of the <S%H2220>arm<s%>; neither shall he <S%H5975>stand<s%>, nor his <S%H2220>arm<s%>: but she shall be given <S%H5414>up<s%>, and they that <S%H935>brought<s%> her, and he that <S%H3205>begat<s%> her, and he that <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> her in these <S%H6256>times<s%>.

But out of a <S%H5342>branch<s%> of her <S%H8328>roots<s%> shall one stand <S%H5975>up<s%> in his <S%H3653>estate<s%>, which shall <S%H935>come<s%> with an <S%H2428>army<s%>, and shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H4581>fortress<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> against them, and shall <S%H2388>prevail<s%>:

And shall also <S%H935>carry<s%> <S%H7628>captives<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>, with their <S%H5257>princes<s%>, and with their <S%H2532>precious<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and of <S%H2091>gold<s%>; and he shall <S%H5975>continue<s%> more <S%H8141>years<s%> than the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>.
So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> into his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, and shall <S%H7725>return<s%> into his own <S%H127>land<s%>.

But his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall be stirred <S%H1624>up<s%>, and shall <S%H622>assemble<s%> a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2428>forces<s%>: and one shall <S%H935>certainly<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, and <S%H7857>overflow<s%>, and pass <S%H5674>through<s%>: then shall he <S%H7725>return<s%>, and be stirred <S%H1624>up<s%>, even to his <S%H4581>fortress<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall be moved with <S%H4843>choler<s%>, and shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> with him, even with the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>: and he shall set <S%H5975>forth<s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%>; but the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And when he hath taken <S%H5375>away<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, his <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall be lifted <S%H7311%H7311>up<s%>; and he shall cast <S%H5307>down<s%> many ten <S%H7239>thousands<s%>: but he shall not be <S%H5810>strengthened<s%> by it.

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%>, and shall set <S%H5975>forth<s%> a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H7227>greater<s%> than the <S%H7223>former<s%>, and shall <S%H935>certainly<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H6256>certain<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> and with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H7399>riches<s%>.

And in those <S%H6256>times<s%> there shall <S%H7227>many<s%> stand <S%H5975>up<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%>: also the <S%H1121%H6530>robbers<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H5375>exalt<s%> themselves to <S%H5975>establish<s%> the <S%H2377>vision<s%>; but they shall <S%H3782>fall<s%>.

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and cast <S%H8210>up<s%> a <S%H5550>mount<s%>, and <S%H3920>take<s%> the most <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>: and the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall not <S%H5975>withstand<s%>, neither his <S%H4005>chosen<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, neither shall there be any <S%H3581>strength<s%> to <S%H5975>withstand<s%>.

But he that <S%H935>cometh<s%> against him shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to his own <S%H7522>will<s%>, and none shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: and he shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H6643>glorious<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, which by his <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be <S%H3617>consumed<s%>.

He shall also <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> with the <S%H8633>strength<s%> of his whole <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, and upright <S%H3477>ones<s%> with him; thus shall he <S%H6213>do<s%>: and he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> him the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H802>women<s%>, <S%H7843>corrupting<s%> her: but she shall not <S%H5975>stand<s%> on his side, neither be for him.

After this shall he <S%H7760%H7725>turn<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> unto the <S%H339>isles<s%>, and shall <S%H3920>take<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%>: but a <S%H7101>prince<s%> for his own behalf shall cause the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> offered by him to <S%H7673>cease<s%>; <S%H1115>without<s%> his own <S%H2781>reproach<s%> he shall cause it to <S%H7725>turn<s%> upon him.
Then he shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H4581>fort<s%> of his own <S%H776>land<s%>: but he shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%>, and not be <S%H4672>found<s%>.

Then shall stand <S%H5975>up<s%> in his <S%H3653>estate<s%> a <S%H5674>raiser<s%> of <S%H5065>taxes<s%> in the <S%H1925>glory<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>: but within <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> he shall be <S%H7665>destroyed<s%>, neither in <S%H639>anger<s%>, nor in <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

And in his <S%H3653>estate<s%> shall stand <S%H5975>up<s%> a vile <S%H959>person<s%>, to whom they shall not <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H1935>honour<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>: but he shall <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H7962>peaceably<s%>, and <S%H2388>obtain<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> by <S%H2519>flatteries<s%>.

And with the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of a <S%H7858>flood<s%> shall they be <S%H7857>overflown<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> him, and shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%>; yea, also the <S%H5057>prince<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And after the <S%H2266>league<s%> made with him he shall <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully<s%>: for he shall come <S%H5927>up<s%>, and shall become <S%H6105>strong<s%> with a <S%H4592>small<s%> <S%H1471>people<s%>.

He shall <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H7962>peaceably<s%> even upon the fattest <S%H4924>places<s%> of the <S%H4082>province<s%>; and he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> that which his <S%H1>fathers<s%> have not <S%H6213>done<s%>, nor his <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%>; he shall <S%H967>scatter<s%> among them the <S%H961>prey<s%>, and <S%H7998>spoil<s%>, and <S%H7399>riches<s%>: yea, and he shall <S%H2803>forecast<s%> his <S%H4284>devices<s%> against the strong <S%H4013>holds<s%>, even for a <S%H6256>time<s%>.

And he shall stir <S%H5782>up<s%> his <S%H3581>power<s%> and his <S%H3824>courage<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%>; and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall be stirred <S%H1624>up<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%>; but he shall not <S%H5975>stand<s%>: for they shall <S%H2803>forecast<s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> against him.

Yea, they that <S%H398>feed<s%> of the portion of his <S%H6598>meat<s%> shall <S%H7665>destroy<s%> him, and his <S%H2428>army<s%> shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%>: and <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> down <S%H2491>slain<s%>.

And <S%H8147>both<s%> these <S%H4428>kings'<s%> <S%H3824>hearts<s%> shall be to do <S%H4827%H7451>mischief<s%>, and they shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7979>table<s%>; but it shall not <S%H6743>prosper<s%>: for yet the <S%H7093>end<s%> shall be at the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%>.

Then shall he <S%H7725>return<s%> into his <S%H776>land<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7399>riches<s%>; and his <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall be against the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>; and he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> exploits, and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his own <S%H776>land<s%>.
At the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%> he shall <S%H7725>return<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> toward the <S%H5045>south<s%>; but it shall not be as the <S%H7223>former<s%>, or as the <S%H314>latter<s%>.

Â¶ For the <S%H6716>ships<s%> of <S%H3794>Chittim<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> against him: therefore he shall be <S%H3512>grieved<s%>, and <S%H7725>return<s%>, and have <S%H2194>indignation<s%> against the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>: so shall he <S%H6213>do<s%>; he shall even <S%H7725>return<s%>, and have <S%H995>intelligence<s%> with them that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And <S%H2220>arms<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> on his part, and they shall <S%H2490>pollute<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H4581>strength<s%>, and shall take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H8548>daily<s%> sacrifice, and they shall <S%H5414>place<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> that maketh <S%H8074>desolate<s%>.

And such as do <S%H7561>wickedly<s%> against the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> shall he <S%H2610>corrupt<s%> by <S%H2514>flatteries<s%>: but the <S%H5971>people<s%> that do <S%H3045>know<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> shall be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> exploits.

And they that <S%H7919>understand<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H995>instruct<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%>: yet they shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and by <S%H3852>flame<s%>, by <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, and by <S%H961>spoil<s%>, many <S%H3117>days<s%>.

Now when they shall <S%H3782>fall<s%>, they shall be <S%H5826>holpen<s%> with a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H5828>help<s%>: but <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H3867>cleave<s%> to them with <S%H2519>flatteries<s%>.

And some of them of <S%H7919>understanding<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall<s%>, to <S%H6884>try<s%> them, and to <S%H1305>purge<s%>, and to make them <S%H3835>white<s%>, even to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end<s%>: because it is yet for a time <S%H4150>appointed<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to his <S%H7522>will<s%>; and he shall <S%H7311>exalt<s%> himself, and <S%H1431>magnify<s%> himself above every <S%H410>god<s%>, and shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> marvellous <S%H6381>things<s%> against the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H410>gods<s%>, and shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> till the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> be <S%H3615>accomplished<s%>: for that that is <S%H2782>determined<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done<s%>.

Neither shall he <S%H995>regard<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, nor the <S%H2532>desire<s%> of <S%H802>women<s%>, nor <S%H995>regard<s%> any <S%H433>god<s%>: for he shall <S%H1431>magnify<s%> himself above all.

But in his <S%H3653>estate<s%> shall he <S%H3513>honour<s%> the <S%H433>God<s%> of <S%H4581>forces<s%>: and a <S%H433>god<s%> whom his <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not shall he <S%H3513>honour<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and with <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and pleasant <S%H2532>things<s%>.

Thus shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> in the most <S%H4581>strong<s%> <S%H4013>holds<s%> with a <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H433>god<s%>, whom he shall <S%H5234%H5234>acknowledge<s%> and <S%H7235>increase<s%> with <S%H3519>glory<s%>: and he shall cause them to <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H7227>many<s%>, and shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H4242>gain<s%>.

And at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end<s%> shall the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H5055>push<s%> at him: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall come against him like a <S%H8175>whirlwind<s%>, with <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and with <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and with <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H591>ships<s%>; and he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H776>countries<s%>, and shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%> and pass <S%H5674>over<s%>.

He shall <S%H935>enter<s%> also into the <S%H6643>glorious<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H7227>many<s%> countries shall be <S%H3782>overthrown<s%>: but these shall <S%H4422>escape<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, even <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>.
He shall stretch <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> also upon the <S%H776>countries<s%>: and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall not <S%H6413>escape<s%>.

But he shall have <S%H4910>power<s%> over the <S%H4362>treasures<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and over all the <S%H2532>precious<s%> things of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and the <S%H3864>Libyans<s%> and the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> shall be at his <S%H4703>steps<s%>.

But <S%H8052>tidings<s%> out of the <S%H4217>east<s%> and out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall <S%H926>trouble<s%> him: therefore he shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%>, and utterly to make <S%H2763>away<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of his <S%H643>palace<s%> between the <S%H3220>seas<s%> in the <S%H6643>glorious<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>; yet he shall <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H7093>end<s%>, and none shall <S%H5826>help<s%> him.
